00028 void Hyperspace::Util::normalize_pathname(std::string name, std::string &normalName) {
00029   normalName = "";
00030   if (name[0] != '/')
00031     normalName += "/";
00032 
00033   if (name.find('/', name.length()-1) == std::string::npos)
00034     normalName += name;
00035   else
00036     normalName += name.substr(0, name.length()-1);
00037 }
00038 
00039 bool Hyperspace::Util::get_handle(std::string name, uint64_t *handlep) {
00040   std::string normalName;
00041 
00042   normalize_pathname(name, normalName);
00043 
00044   Global::FileMapT::iterator iter = Global::fileMap.find(normalName);
00045   if (iter == Global::fileMap.end()) {
00046     std::cerr << "Unable to find '" << normalName << "' in open file map" << std::endl;
00047     return false;
00048   }
00049   *handlep = (*iter).second;
00050   return true;
00051 }
